remarks: A group has a left identity element, and every member has a left inverse.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpfo.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpolidinv $p |- ( G e. GrpOp -> E. u e. X A. x e. X ( ( u G x ) = x /\ E. y e. X ( y G x ) = u ) ) $.
$d G u x y $.
$d X u x y $.
